mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(r.Material1, '') AS Material1, COALESCE(r.`#1`, '') AS `#1`, COALESCE(r.Material2, '') AS Material2, COALESCE(r.`#2`, '') AS `#2`, COALESCE(r.Material3, '') AS Material3, COALESCE(r.`#3`, '') AS `#3`, COALESCE(r.Material4, '') AS Material4, COALESCE(r.`#4`, '') AS `#4`, COALESCE(r.Material5, '') AS Material5, COALESCE(r.`#5`, '') AS `#5`, COALESCE(r.Material6, '') AS Material6, COALESCE(r.`#6`, '') AS `#6` FROM houseware h JOIN recipe r ON h.Name = r.Name WHERE h.Name = #{name} AND h.DIY = 'yes'
